casebody.data:
CABARRUS COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
DEPARTMENT OF STATE TREASURER, et al. 369PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 18, 2019 Blake W. Thomas, Deputy General Counsel, Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, Joseph A. Newsome, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Michael Crowell, Attorney at Law, Deborah R. Stagner, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cabarrus County Board of Education. Elizabeth L. Troutman, Attorney at Law, Jill R. Wilson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, for N.C. School Boards Association.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of April 2019 by Respondents:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of April 2019."

Respondents shall have up to and including the 29th day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
